abstract: Letter from New York City First Lady Chirlane McCray comments on December 11 article on rise in number of very young children being prescribed psychiatric medications.
lead_paragraph: Chirlane McCray, the city’s first lady, describes ThriveNYC, a new program to create more and better services.

headline.main: Mental Health in New York City

snippet: Chirlane McCray, the city’s first lady, describes ThriveNYC, a new program to create more and better services.
